FEATURE_WEB_DEVELOPMENT_TEXT: Full stack Web Developer met een passie voor moderne frameworks and a clean development process.
FEATURE_CREATIVE_CODING_TEXT: Exploring the perfect combination of two passions: Art and Technology. Creating generative designs and libraries along the way.
FEATURE_OTLI_TEXT: We spend too much time distracted on internet platforms. I created Otli, a browser extension that hides distracting content so you can focus on your initial goal.
